channel.title: Fixing pvp helms and pvp weapons and plates
channel.description: Pvp plates are alright but i want to fix them better u can see the shoulders lil buggy where do i put them on item .java. Then when i put the pvp weapons on it has no spec and it says no existence. Then the helms idk where to put them it always put on a weapon.

item.title: Fixing pvp helms and pvp weapons and plates
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Try following a guide first.

Weapon - Special.java, Item.Cfg.

Helmet - Itemwear.java or (wear.java) add to full helmets.

Plates - " " " (" ") add to the top plates, alot of times, you canâ€™t get it 100% fixed.

Read full topic
item.source: Fixing pvp helms and pvp weapons and plates
